text: Great power plant designing company...good employee friendly and treat u like a family...good place to work with

The receptionist who picked up the phone was so damn rude. She talked as if she was the boss for the company. I just made a simple enquiry and she started raising her voice and she got frustrated and angry at me for no apparent reason. So ridiculous. Company has to make sure not to hire rude staff as behaviour like this can easily spoil a reputation of a company.
Lead engineer (Poh Kuah Goh) very rude, "lepas tangan", bad leader and bully new staff. In Seatrium Penang or JED

JEL provides its clients with on-going facility maintenance services through its subsidiary, JEL Maintenance Pte Ltd (JML).Our customers have found utilising JML’s services a cost effective approach because of to its technical expertise. JML’s services can be customised to the specific needs of each individual customer.
Nice company to work for but compensation is too less comparing other companies. Work culture is good in company. People are cooperative.
